name: udemy-coupons
title: Udemy Coupons
description: Get instant access to 1000+ premium Udemy courses for FREE with verified coupons. Updated hourly. Learn programming, design, business, marketing & more. Save $1000s on top-rated courses.
author: dharmendra

commands.name: udemy-coupons
commands.title: Free Udemy Courses
commands.description: Browse and enroll in premium Udemy courses for FREE. Find verified coupons for programming, web development, data science, design, business, marketing, and more. Updated hourly with fresh deals.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
